answers.answer: Hi and thanks for using the forum.There is no seperate expert forum that distinguishes between type 1 and type 2 diabetes, so feel free to post any questions here on this forum.  There is a type 1 diabetes forum in the medical support communities.  You can access it using this linkhttp://www.medhelp.org/forums/Diabetes---Juvenile-Type-I/show/220I hope this helps.  Good luck.Bridget

question: I cannot find forum on here for type 1 diabetes
